name: Deadly Standards 4
summary: A community made Episode 4 replacement for Ultimate Doom, sequel of the highly acclaimed and cacoward runner-up Deadly Standards episodic series. This time the classic stock assets theme got a rough deviation to more new assets, taken mostly from Alpha Doom and Romero dump of unused assets, as well as some other sources like Doomer Boards: Earth Ends and Ghostbusters Doom. Fight a terrifying world of a hell (on Earth?) that you never experienced before! Behold, the horrors of bureaucracy in a corporate world where anonymous towns are dominated by brutalism!
